content.question: The platformâ€™s references to minorities and multicultural communities reflect which of the following trends in late-twentieth-century Europe?

choices.label: The collapse of communism in Eastern Europe
The increasing reliance on immigrant labor
The reaction against the influence of American pop culture
The effects of the postwar baby boom

content.answer: The increasing reliance on immigrant labor

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
